item.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack launches January 29, 2026 worldwide
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Turning Points, Gems, new events, Chinese voice-overs, and more.

Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack, previously reported as Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake with Power-Up Kit, will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on January 29, 2026 worldwide, publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Kou Shibusawa announced.

In Japan, the game will be available in the following editions:

  • For Those Who Do Not Own Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake
    • Physical and Digital
      • Standard – 10,780 yen (PS5, PS4, Switch) / 11,880 yen (PC)
      • “Treasure Box” Limited Edition – 17,600 yen (PS5, PS4, Switch) / 18,700 yen (PC)
        • Includes a copy of the game, a 500-piece mosaic art jigsaw puzzle, a set of two A4 clear files, a soundtrack CD, and the bonus fictional scenario “The Divided Age.”
  • For Those Who Do Own Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake
    • Physical and Digital
      • Downloadable Content “Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack” – 5,280 yen (PC)
      • Downloadable Content “Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack” “Treasure Box” Limited Edition – 12,100 yen (PC)
        • Includes the downloadable content “Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack,” a 500-piece mosaic art jigsaw puzzle, a set of two A4 clear files, a soundtrack CD, and the bonus fictional scenario “The Divided Age.”
    • Digital
      • Downloadable Content “Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack” – 4,730 yen (PS5, PS4, Switch)

In the west, Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake: Destiny and Strategy Expansion Pack will be available as downloadable content for Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake. It is currently unclear whether a digital bundle or physical release is planned, though the latter is unlikely considering the base game was only released digitally in the west.

Here is an overview of the new content, via its Steam page:

About

A boundless Three Kingdoms experience.

To celebrate the series’ 40th anniversary, we have improved the quality of and added new content to the “Play as All Officers” feature of Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake, which allows you to play as any officer in the world of the Three Kingdoms. Enjoy the game to the fullest with new elements like Turning Points and Gems, new events, and a new Chinese voice option.

Key Features

  • Turmoil and Tension Abound in the New Turning Point System – Experience new gameplay through various Turning Points, each with their own far-reaching effects. You will need to predict which Turning Points are likely to occur and employ appropriate strategies to work alongside or counter them.
  • Gems Based on Status and Reputation Result in a Variety of Play Styles – Enable a range of possible actions through different Gem types based on your current status. You will have to consider each Gem’s effects to decide which to unlock and use for your officer’s development.
  • New Features and Data Make It Easier to Customize Your Play Experience – We have added the highly requested Chinese voice option and made all cutscenes fully voiced. We have also enhanced the data for Traits, historical events, and Official Titles, and have implemented in-game editing and Registered Specialties features.

Watch the announcement trailer and a Romance of the Three Kingdoms series 40th anniversary trailer below. Visit the Japanese official website here, and the newly launched 40th anniversary website here.
